DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Ginseng effective prevention atherosclerosis subsequent ischemic stroke .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Severe stenosis occlusion internal carotid artery , middle cerebral artery vertebrobasilar system 2 . No adverse reaction ginseng 3 . Aged 20 80 year 1 . Genetic cerebrovascular disease 2 . Adverse reaction contrast medium 3 . Pregnant woman 4 . History previous cerebral angioplasty stenting , carotid endarterectomy , bypass surgery 5 . History cardioembolic stroke possibility cardioembolic stroke 6 . Possibility cancer stroke 7 . Renal failure ( GFR < 30 ml/min ) liver disease
